author: sky.cactus
content: Ethereum solved the data availability problem with forking.  The same solution doesn't work on L2s because they can't fork.

author: sky.cactus
content: If you don't have access to a block body, you'll fork away (as will everyone else) so not supplying the data to the network will result in everyone essentially ignoring your block.
